title: Cranberry roast pork
ingredients: ['3 (195g) jars cranberry sauce', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '100ml (4 fl oz) cranberry juice', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 large boneless pork loin roast', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '2 tablespoons cold water', 'salt to taste']
